review: I order on the second day. Found out that i won't be getting it till December 2013. I got an email 4 week later revising the shipping date. Just received it after 6 weeks. Late delivery is not Amazon's fault. Factory was backordered due to heavy demand.Did not get the free netflix trial as advertised.Overall the product is good for youtube streaming. That's it. Currently it is only a one-trick pony. Can't do anything else.Can't stream local user owned content like music, vidoe and pictures. Third party app support is very lacking .What is most concerning is that, google is trying to limit outside content being streamed, i don't know why? I want to stream the pictures I took not the movie I buy from play store.
author: O.F

review: I ordered this device the first day it was launched - which included the 3 months free netflix subscription. So my total cost of ownership was $11 only, and in that respect it was an awesome device. The Google Cast support in YouTube and Netflix apps is pretty good, and the quality of streaming is as great it can be. Wish 'casting' a tab on Chrome from you laptop would as flawless as playing youtube/netflix content, but this depends on a lot of other factors so I wont really hold it against Chromecast per se.So for a 'beta' - version 1.0 product, I was pretty satisfied with it overall, and use it exclusively to play web content on my TV.I prefer using the Chromecast over the in-built apps in my TV/DVD/Receiver.Version 2.0 needs a couple of things fixed- Re-configuring the device after the first time setup is a pain. I would need it to be powered off and connect to it using its wireless network , but that drops of more often than not. This needs to be fixed- This might be an App issue  but the Netflix app on iOS needs to improve for better playback/integration with the device.- More apps/content providers need to use Google Cast. I wonder what it would take for, say, shows like Daily Show to enable streaming to ChromeCast? A lot of potential for that sort of integration, I hope it happens.
